summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NSTU Property Tax Manager PDF Bills features. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend UI verified successfully. Key features tested: Admin login (admin/nastu123), PDF Bills page with 1164 bills, GPS Route sorting, PDF generation with serial numbers, Employee PDF splitting, Bills Map visualization, Property Map page with action buttons.

minor.issue: DatasetBatchResponse model doesn't include 'type' field, so PDF_BILLS batches are not distinguishable in API response

issues: With GPS count shows only current page bills (20) instead of total (1164) - minor display issue
Batches count shows 0 because API doesn't return 'type' field for filtering

passed_tests: PDF Bills page displays 1164 bills from uploaded PDFs
PDF Bills - Arrange by GPS Route button functionality works
PDF Bills - Generate PDF button opens dialog with options (position, font size, color)
PDF Bills - Generate PDF API creates PDF with serial numbers
PDF Bills - Split by Employee button opens dialog with employee count input
PDF Bills - Split by Employee API generates 5 separate PDFs (233 bills each)
PDF Bills - View Map navigation works
Bills Map page displays 1164 bill markers on map with serial numbers
Bills Map shows color-coded markers by category (Residential, Commercial, Vacant Plot, Mix Use)
Property Map page displays correctly with satellite view
Property Map - Arrange by GPS Route button present (disabled when no properties)
Property Map - Save Arranged Data button present (disabled when no properties)
Property Map - Download Arranged PDF button opens dialog
Property Map APIs correctly return 404 when no properties exist
action_items: OPTIONAL: Add 'type' field to DatasetBatchResponse model to enable batch filtering by type
OPTIONAL: Fix 'With GPS' count on Bills page to show total count instead of current page count
seed_data_creation: Used existing 1164 bills in 'bills' collection from Akash Nagar colony
context_for_next_testing_agent: All PDF Bills features verified: (1) Bills page shows 1164 bills with GPS coordinates from Akash Nagar colony. (2) Arrange by GPS Route sorts bills using nearest neighbor algorithm. (3) Generate PDF creates PDF with serial numbers at configurable position/size/color. (4) Split by Employee divides bills equally among N employees and generates separate PDFs. (5) Bills Map shows all 1164 markers with serial numbers and category colors. (6) Property Map page has 3 action buttons but shows 0 properties (data is in 'bills' collection, not 'properties' collection). Note: The 'properties' collection is empty - all property data was uploaded as PDF bills to the 'bills' collection.
